name: vector-network-playground
description: Playground for exploring for SVG-like vector networks, as built in Figma

scripts.build: rm -r dist && NODE_ENV=production parcel build browser/index.pug --public-url "." --no-source-maps
scripts.test: npm run precheck && NODE_ENV=test mocha --recursive test/ && npm run lint

author: Todd Wolfson <todd@twolfson.com> (http://twolfson.com/)
